channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- ENOVIA Collaborative Industry Innovator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dassault Systèmes -- ENOVIA Collaborative Industry Innovator

item.title: CVE-2024-6380|2024-10-16T16:18:04.990Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- enovia%20collaborative%20industry%20innovator
item.description: A reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting ENOVIA Collaborative Industry Innovator from Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2022x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2024x allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in user's browser session.
